hymn.title: Lord, You're irresistible
hymn.chords: | C - Am - | Em - Am - | F - Am - | Dm - G - | C - Am - | Em - Am - | F - Am - | Dm - G - | Dm7 - G - | Dm7 - G - | F - G - | C - - - | Am - - - | Dm7 - G - | Dm7 - G - | C - - - | C - - - | F - G - | Dm7 - G - | C - - - | Am - - - | Dm7 - G - | Dm7 - G - | C - F/C - | C - - - |

layout.singingstanza: Lord, You're ir -- re -- sist -- i -- ble, And, dear Lord, You're won -- der -- ful! Lord, You have at -- tract -- ed me, Cap -- tured, Lord, by Your beau -- ty. No one, dear Lord, com -- pares to You, my Love. There's none on earth or in the heav -- en a -- bove. Yes, ev -- ery -- thing com -- pared to You is van -- i -- ty. Dear Lord, You are the one u -- nique re -- al -- i -- ty.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, You're irresistible, And, dear Lord, You're wonderful! Lord, You have attracted me, Captured, Lord, by Your beauty.
No one, dear Lord, compares to You, my Love. There's none on earth or in the heaven above. Yes, everything compared to You is vanity. Dear Lord, You are the one unique reality.
Lord, You're indescribable, And, Lord, You're so enjoyable! Lord, You are majestic! Lord, You're so fantastic!
Lord, You are the loveliest, And, dear Lord, the finest. Lord, You are the highest, And, dear One, the very best!
Lord, You're the most excellent, And, Lord, You're just magnificent! Lord, Oh Lord, You're ultimate! Dearest One, You're infinite!
No one, Lord, can e'er compete, And, dearest Lord, You're so complete! Lord, You're so refreshing! And, Lord, You are my everything!
